full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LAM ZAB RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR GYI 'DON CHA'I ZUR 'DEBS BDUD GCOD RAL GRI ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES BSNGO SMON BYA BA STE, RJE GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA 'DI NI GCOD KYI RNAM 'BYOR THUN DRUG TU SKYONG BA LA NYE BAR MKHO ZHING, DOG BDE BA, DMIGS RNAM GYI GNAD TSANG BA YIN ZHES GSUNGS, ,GONG GI 'DON CHA RNAMS LAM ZAB RGYUN GYI RNAM 'BYOR GZHIR BZHAG PA YIN KYANG BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DANG LUS SBYIN 'DOD MOS DAD BSTUN TE SBYAR NA YANG SHIN TU RUNG NGO, ,BDAG GIS 'DI LTAR SBYAR BA'I DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,'GRO BA KUN GYIS KUN RDZOB BYANG, @018B SEMS DANG, DON DAM SEMS MCHOG BGROD PA MTHAR PHYIN NAS, ,BDUD TSOGS MA LUS DBYINGS SU SGROL BAR SHOG ,GCOD KYI 'DON CHA 'DI YANG DON GNYER CAN MANG PO'I 'DOD MOS LTAR ^ KUN MKHYEN MCHOG GI SPRUL PA'I SKU RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO DBUS NAS MDO SMAD DU 'BYON PA'I PHEBS BSUR PHYIN PA'I LAM BAR GYI GNAS NGES MED DAG TU THOR BU YID LA GANG DRAN GYI TSUL DU BRIS SHING, BDE MO THANG DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING DU MJUG GRUB PAR BGYIS PA'O,, ` ,,KHO BOR RATNA DHVA DZA BLO GROS DMAN, ,SBYANGS PA CHUNG ZHING NYAMS LEN MED PA'I SKYON, ,GANG 'DIR 'GAL ZLOS MA 'BREL LA SOGS PAS, ,SPAGS SRID MKHAS PA'I TSOGS KYIS BZOD PAR GSOL, ,MKHAS RNAMS DGYES PA BSKYED PAR MI NUS KYANG, ,RANG MNYAM BLO DMAN DAG LA PHAN SLAD DU, ,BKOD PA 'DIR MA CIG YE SHES MKHA' 'GRO MAS, ,BRTZE BAS GZIGS LA DNGOS GRUB CHAR DU SNYIL,, ,, ('DI YANG KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I SDE'I, ,THUGS RJE LA BRTEN BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GLING GI ,LHO RGYUD MDO SNGAGS CHOS SGRA SGROGS PA'I TSAL, ,DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING DU LEGS PAR GRUB, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
